title: Tallos - Episode One
description: TALLOS- It's been two years since the collapse of society. In a single week all social services, food production, and communications came to a grinding halt. Those few who refused the call to go to Atlanta are left to fend for themselves...and wonder. Why has no one ever returned? And what...or who is really behind it all?Episode One - Clinging to the faint hope that his family will one day return home, James Tallos must choose between what he feels in his heart and his duty to those who need him most.
author: Brian D. Anderson
